<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/agreements/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retorna los detalles de un acuerdo en su última versión.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"ID del acuerdo a buscar","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"agr_1B2M2Y8AsgTpgAmY7PhCfg"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
